mapper.select: select pet.*, profile_origin, profile_name from pet inner join img_profile on pet.profile_num = img_profile.profile_num
mapper.insert: insert into pet (p_id, g_id, animal, birth, kind, breed, profile_num, feature, gender, neutering, state ) values ( #{p_id},#{g_id}, #{animal}, #{birth}, #{kind}, #{breed}, #{profile_num}, #{feature}, #{gender}, #{neutering}, #{state})

select ifnull(max(profile_num),0) + 1 from img_profile
insert into img_profile values(#{profile_num}, #{profile_origin}, #{profile_name})
mapper.select: select profile_name from img_profile where profile_num=#{profile_num}
mapper.update: update img_profile set profile_name=#{profile_name} profile_origin=#{profile_origin} where profile_num=#{profile_num}
